title: Some rigidity results for charged initial data sets
abstract:
In this note, we consider some initial data rigidity results concerning
marginally outer trapped surfaces (MOTS). As is well known, MOTS play an
important role in the theory of black holes and, at the same time, are
interesting spacetime analogues of minimal surfaces in Riemannian geometry. The
main results presented here expand upon earlier works by the authors,
specifically addressing initial data sets incorporating charge.
